message.content:
cs.CV, cs.RO, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.GR 

This paper deals with computer vision and robotics, specifically in the area of 3D structure and semantic understanding of indoor scenes. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The use of convolutional neural networks and loss functions also suggests a focus on machine learning, making cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) another likely category. The use of 3D surfaces and plane equations suggests a focus on geometry and graphics, making cs.GR (Computer Graphics) a possible category. Finally, the use of contextual priors and the goal of extrapolating beyond the field of view suggests a focus on robotics and autonomous systems, making cs.RO (Robotics) a likely category as well.
